document_data.name: ''Blood of Tyche''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Blood of Tyche''''' were variety of [[potion]]s used by worshipers of [[Tymora]]. These potions entered circulation post-''[[Spellplague]]''.
document_data.Description: ''Blood of Tyche'' was a swirling potion of liquid luck and deadly [[poison]], bottled in [[gold]]en [[vial]]s.
document_data.Powers: When consumed, ''Blood of Tyche'' suppressed the imbiber's ability to heal naturally in exchange for a dose of luck.
